revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_SerpentRaiseHump'''
(''no parameter'')
Decreases the floor clipping by 4 units in order to raise the hump above the surface. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Serpent}} and derived classes.
